title: La Bamba
lyrics:
[intro] | (C)  (F) | (G) |  x2
 
Para bailar la (C)Bamba (F)  (G)
Para bailar la (C)Bamba se (F)nece(G)sita
Una poca de (C)gracia (F)  (G)
Una poca de (C)gracia pa (F)mi pa (G)ti
Ay arriba y arri(C)ba (F)  (G)
Ay y arriba y ar(C)riba, por (F)ti se(G)re
Por ti sere (C) por (F)ti se(G-stop)re
 
Yo no soy mari(C)nero (F)  (G)
Yo no soy mari(C)nero soy (F)capi(G)tan
Soy capi(C)tan soy (F)capi(G)tan
 
[chorus]
(C)Bam(F)ba la (G)Bamba
(C)Bam(F)ba la (G)Bamba
(C)Bam(F)ba la (G)Bamba
(C)Bam(F)ba la (G)Bamba
 
Para subir al (C)cielo (F)  (G)
Para subir al (C)cielo se (F)nece(G)sita
Una escalera (C)larga (F)  (G)
Una escalera (C)larga y (F)otra co(G)sita
Ay arriba y arri(C)ba (F)  (G)
Ay arriba y ar(C)riba con(F)tigo (G)ire
Yo no soy mari(C)nero (F)  (G)
Yo no soy mari(C)nero soy (F)capi(G)tan
Soy capi(C)tan soy (F)capi(G)tan
 
[chorus]
(C)Bam(F)ba la (G)Bamba
(C)Bam(F)ba la (G)Bamba
(C)Bam(F)ba la (G)Bamba
(C)Bam(F)ba la (G)Bamba
(C-single strum) [end]
